prism

Class PrismPythonTalker

  • java.lang.Object
    • prism.PrismPythonTalker

  • public class PrismPythonTalker
extends java.lang.Object
    Example class demonstrating how to control PRISM programmatically, i.e. through the "API" exposed by the class prism.Prism. (this now uses the newer version of the API, released after PRISM 4.0.3) Test like this: PRISM_MAINCLASS=prism.PrismTest bin/prism ../prism-examples/polling/poll2.sm ../prism-examples/polling/poll3.sm
